scripts.install-all: npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix dashboard install
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n api,client,dashboard -c magenta,cyan,green "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev" "npm --prefix dashboard run dev"
scripts.dev:client: concurrently -k -n api,client -c magenta,cyan "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.dev:dashboard: concurrently -k -n api,dashboard -c magenta,green "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix dashboard run dev"
